MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL18 postcode area of Rhyl, affecting properties in Heol Y Llys, Bryn Llys and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1PM due to an underground cable fault. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the underground network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:25PM on 9th February 2021
